column2: This Privacy Statement addresses SRL's practices regarding information collected only directly through or from the Site
SRL may place Internet "cookies" on visitors' hard drives.
SRL may place Internet "cookies" on visitors' hard drives.
Internet cookies save data about individual visitors, such as the visitor's name, password, user-name, shopping cart, screen preferences, and the pages of the Site viewed by the visitor.

SRL also may use Web bugs to gather, store, and track certain information related to your visit to and activity on the Site. A Web bug is a file object, which can be a graphic image such as a transparent one pixel-by-one pixel graphics file, which is placed on a Web page or in an e-mail message to monitor user activity.
